Key Arguments: The legislation goes against human rights for free speech.
Individuals have the right to free will and to express their own opinions.
It is the community's role to determine the truthfulness of statements, not the government's.
The legislation is seen as a step towards fascism and dictatorship.
There is a belief that Western governments are being influenced by global organizations like the UN, WHO, and WEF.
Main Themes: Distrust of government and global organizations
Notable Quotes: Free speech in a democratic society is our RIGHT!
If this bill is passed this will be a downhill path to Fascism and Dictatorship.
